description: The origins of (H)Enna are unclear. Some sources claim it was founded by Syracuse in 664 B.C. but the archaeological record suggests it is likely a Hellenized Sikel settlement.

names.details: The city changed its modern name from Castrogiovanni to Enna in 1927.
